name: longsword token
description: A large silver coin that, when activated by uttering the word on the back, turns into the item pictured on the front, in this case a longsword.

use_action.msg: You say the command word engraved on the token, and it rapidly grows and morphs into a shiny pristine longsword!

description: This is a classic medieval sword, in between the lighter arming sword and later two-handed swords in size.  It requires a larger baldric or scabbard, compared to smaller swords.

use_action.msg: 裏面に刻まれた呪文を唱えると、硬貨は急速に変化し、真新しい魔法硬貨になりました！

description: A large silver coin that, when activated by uttering the word on the back, turns into the item pictured on the front, in this case an arming sword.

use_action.msg: You say the command word engraved on the token, and it rapidly grows and morphs into a shiny pristine arming sword!

description: This is a classic medieval sword, just the right size to use one-handed.

use_action.msg: 裏面に刻まれた呪文を唱えると、アーミングソードは急速に変化し、真新しい魔法硬貨になりました！

name: broadsword token
description: A large silver coin that, when activated by uttering the word on the back, turns into the item pictured on the front, in this case a broadsword.

use_action.msg: You say the command word engraved on the token, and it rapidly grows and morphs into a shiny pristine broadsword!

description: This is an early modern sword that saw use in the 16th, 17th, and 18th centuries.  Called 'broad' to contrast with the slimmer rapiers.

use_action.msg: 裏面に刻まれた呪文を唱えると、ブロードソードは急速に変化し、真新しい魔法硬貨になりました！

description: A large silver coin that, when activated by uttering the word on the back, turns into the item pictured on the front, in this case a battle axe.

use_action.msg: You say the command word engraved on the token, and it rapidly grows and morphs into a shiny pristine battle axe!

description: This is a huge axe designed for warfare.  Though intended for use as a weapon, it can also be pressed into service as a rather clumsy woodcutting tool.

use_action.msg: 裏面に刻まれた呪文を唱えると、バトルアックスは急速に変化し、真新しい魔法硬貨になりました！

name: pike token
description: A large silver coin that, when activated by uttering the word on the back, turns into the item pictured on the front, in this case a pike.

use_action.msg: You say the command word engraved on the token, and it rapidly grows and morphs into a shiny pristine pike!

description: This is a medieval weapon consisting of a wood shaft tipped with an iron spearhead.

use_action.msg: 裏面に刻まれた呪文を唱えると、パイクは急速に変化し、真新しい魔法硬貨になりました！

name: mace token
description: A large silver coin that, when activated by uttering the word on the back, turns into the item pictured on the front, in this case a mace.

use_action.msg: You say the command word engraved on the token, and it rapidly grows and morphs into a shiny pristine mace!

description: A medieval weapon consisting of a wood handle with a heavy iron end.  It is heavy and slow, but its crushing damage is devastating.
//: Same total damage and slightly higher weight than a morningstar - exchanged.

use_action.msg: 裏面に刻まれた呪文を唱えると、メイスは急速に変化し、真新しい魔法硬貨になりました！

name: quarterstaff token
description: A large silver coin that, when activated by uttering the word on the back, turns into the item pictured on the front, in this case a quarterstaff.

use_action.msg: You say the command word engraved on the token, and it rapidly grows and morphs into a pristine quarterstaff!

description: A smooth and sturdy staff.  Light and well-balanced, it is surprisingly easy to handle.

use_action.msg: 裏面に刻まれた呪文を唱えると、六尺棒は急速に変化し、真新しい魔法硬貨になりました！

name: hammer token
description: A large silver coin that, when activated by uttering the word on the back, turns into the item pictured on the front, in this case a hammer.

use_action.msg: You say the command word engraved on the token, and it rapidly grows and morphs into a shiny pristine hammer!

description: 持ち手が木製になっている、磁気除去済みの鋼鉄製くぎ抜き金づちです。ハンマー、釘、木材を所持していれば、隣接したドアや窓に板を打ち付けることができます。その他にも無数の用途があります。

use_action.msg: 裏面に刻まれた呪文を唱えると、ハンマーは急速に変化し、真新しい魔法硬貨になりました！

name: screwdriver set token
description: A large silver coin that, when activated by uttering the word on the back, turns into the item pictured on the front, in this case a screwdriver.

use_action.msg: You say the command word engraved on the token, and it rapidly grows and morphs into a shiny pristine screwdriver set!

description: This is a set of screwdrivers in several sizes and blade types.  Guaranteed to have the right tools for more precise work.

use_action.msg: 裏面に刻まれた呪文を唱えると、ドライバーセットは急速に変化し、真新しい魔法硬貨になりました！

name: crowbar token
description: A large silver coin that, when activated by uttering the word on the back, turns into the item pictured on the front, in this case a crowbar.

use_action.msg: You say the command word engraved on the token, and it rapidly grows and morphs into a shiny pristine crowbar!

description: This is a hefty prying tool.  Use it to open locked doors without destroying them or to lift manhole covers.  You could also wield it to bash some heads in.

use_action.msg: 裏面に刻まれた呪文を唱えると、バールは急速に変化し、真新しい魔法硬貨になりました！

name: 魔法硬貨(ハリガンバール)
description: 裏面に刻まれた呪文を読み上げると表面に描かれた物に変化する、大きな銀貨です。この硬貨にはハリガンバールが描かれています。

use_action.msg: 裏面に刻まれた呪文を唱えると、魔法硬貨は急速に変化し、真新しいハリガンバールになりました！

description: This is a heavy multiple-use tool commonly carried by firefighters, law enforcement, and military rescue units.  Use it to open locked doors without destroying them or to lift manhole covers.  You could also wield it to bash some heads in.

use_action.msg: 裏面に刻まれた呪文を唱えると、ハリガンバールは急速に変化し、真新しい魔法硬貨になりました！
